thread.title: EastEnders viewers fuming over 'forgotten' Roxy Mitchell as the focus is on sister Ronnie
thread.title_full: EastEnders viewers fuming over 'forgotten' Roxy Mitchell as the focus is on sister Ronnie

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: EastEnders viewers fuming over 'forgotten' Roxy Mitchell as the focus is on sister Ronnie

organizations.name: cancel play now emotional jack branning

text:
EastEnders viewers fuming over 'forgotten' Roxy Mitchell as the focus is on sister Ronnie Fans watching on Thursday weren't impressed that Roxy was getting more of a mention Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jack is distraught as he weeps over Ronnie's body Share this video Get soaps   Thank you for subscribing!   
EastEnders viewers were disappointed this week as Ronnie Mitchell appeared to get more attention than her sister Roxy. 
The two siblings were killed off at the beginning of 2017 in devastating scenes, and Thursday's episode saw the residents of Albert Square preparing for their funeral in an emotional storyline. 
However, when Danny Mitchell was introduced in the Queen Vic as "Ronnie's brother", fans were disappointed that her sister was being forgotten - and they took to Twitter to make their voices heard. Danny was introduced as Ronnie's brother (Photo: BBC) Not Roxy's? (Photo: BBC) Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now EastEnders reveals the real reason Ronnie and Roxy died... Share this video 
"HES ROXY'S BROTHER TOO!! Why isn't no one mentioning Roxy #EastEnders (sic)," tweeted one viewers. 
A different user ranted: "'Ronnies brother' what about Roxy? #EastEnders (sic)" Roxy Mitchell (RITA SIMONS), Ronnie Mitchell (SAMANTHA WOMACK) (Photo: BBC) 
Another wrote: ""This is Danny... Ronnie's brother" Not Roxy's too? #EastEnders (sic)" Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Emotional Jack Branning tells the kids about Ronnie's death Share this video Watch Next 
It's been just over two weeks since the tragic deaths of Ronnie and Roxie Mitchell - and the residents of Albert Square seemed pretty cut up about their loss a few days after the freak accident. 
However, earlier this week viewers suggested it seemed like everyone has now forgotten about the sisters - despite the fact their funeral is on Friday. (Photo: BBC) 
Noticeably, Roxy's daughter Amy appears to have forgotten her mother existed - instead of asking about her mum, she only ever speaks about her Auntie Ronnie. 
Those tuning in at home aren't happy that producers seem to be 'airbrushing' iconic characters like the Mitchell sisters from the show's history. 
Taking to Twitter, one wrote: "Omg Ronnie and Roxie don't even get a full epic funeral episode! The writers must have fallen out with Sam Womack & Rita Simons #EastEnders." Like us on Facebook
